sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些词均可表"值得的"之意。
means: worth ： 前置词，后接名词或相当于名词的词，指做某事有一定价值或意义。
worthy ： 形容词，与worth同义，但搭配不相同。
worthwhile ： 形容词，用作表语或定语，指某事物是值得的，或某事是值得做的。

sentence.Network_en: It might be worthwhile to consider your attitude to an insurance policy.
sentence.Network_cn: 考虑一下你对投保的看法也许有所助益。

sentence.Network_en: The President's trip to Washington this week seems to have been worthwhile.
sentence.Network_cn: 总统本周的华盛顿之行看来是有价值的。

sentence.Network_en: The teacher recommended some really worthwhile novels to his students.
sentence.Network_cn: 老师推荐给学生一些真正有价值的小说.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 新初中英语词汇表 - 祥哥的日志 - 网易博客 ... worthless a. 没有价值的，没有用的 worthwhile a. 值得做的 wounded a. 受伤的.
全新版大学英语第二版综合教程一单词_百度知道 ... valid 有根据的 worthwhile 值得的 superior 优良的；较好的.
合字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 合适〖 fit;suitable;appropriate〗 合算〖 paying;worthwhile〗 合算〖 reckonup〗.
记忆英语单词方法 ... wealth n. ① 财富, 财产, ②大量,许多 worthwhile adj. 值得做的, 值得出力的 window n. 窗,窗口,橱窗.

list.abs: 大学体验英语(二) ... get just enough money for all one’s needs 使收支相抵 be worthwhile 是值得的 because of 幸亏.
That's the way it is. 就是这么回事。That's worthwhile. 那是值得的。The same to you. 你也一样。
let Us SmileThe thing that goes the farthest toward making life worthwhile , That costs the least and the most , is just a pleasant smile .让我们继续微笑，那最能赋予生命价值、代价最廉而回报最多的东西，不过一个令人心畅的微笑而已。
HQ周虹&江... ... 09 萍聚 The short gathering 3：06 10 不值得 Not worthwhile 5：08 11 花开花落 Flower blossom and fade 2：53.

entry.tran: 有价值的;令人愉快的；值得花费时间（或金钱、精力）的
entry.def: If something is worthwhile, it is enjoyable or useful, and worth the time, money, or effort that is spent on it.

example.ex: The President's trip to Washington this week seems to have been worthwhile...
example.tran: 总统本周的华盛顿之行看来是有价值的。

example.ex: ...a worthwhile movie that was compelling enough to watch again...
example.tran: 非常吸引人、值得再看一遍的精彩影片

means.word_mean: 1. sufficiently valuable to justify the investment of time or interest;

auth_sentence.content: The campaign against the disease is achieving worthwhile results.
auth_sentence.res_content: The campaign against the disease is achieving worthwhile results.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The campaign against the disease is achieving worthwhile results.

auth_sentence.content: You have persuaded someone to do a worthwhile task.
auth_sentence.res_content: You have persuaded someone to do a worthwhile task.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: You have persuaded someone to do a worthwhile task.

auth_sentence.content: It is beautiful and worthwhile to study at depth.
auth_sentence.res_content: It is beautiful and worthwhile to study at depth.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It is beautiful and worthwhile to study at depth.

stems_affixes.word_buile: worth值得→adj.值得…的 n.价值 v.值…的，价值… prep.值得……的
worth值得+less无……的→adj.无价值的, 无益的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 值得做的, 值得出力的
stems_affixes.word_buile: worth值得+while→adj.值得做的, 值得出力的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 有价值的, 应……的, 可敬的, 值得的, 相称的
stems_affixes.word_buile: worth值得+y表形容词→adj.有价值的, 应……的, 可敬的, 值得的, 相称的
wor=worth值得+ship状态→认为值得[信任]→尊敬
worth值得→adj.值得…的 n.价值 v.值…的，价值… prep.值得……的
worth值得→adj.值得…的 n.价值 v.值…的，价值… prep.值得……的
wor=worth值得+ship状态→认为值得[信任]→尊敬
worth值得→adj.值得…的 n.价值 v.值…的，价值… prep.值得……的

Sentence.sentence: It makes all the hard work worthwhile.
He took a 30% salary cut but felt it worthwhile for the greater intellectual opportunities.

means.word_mean: 值得的, 值钱的, 有价值的

sentences.en: The teacher recommended some really worthwhile novels to his students.
sentences.cn: 老师推荐给学生一些真正有价值的小说。

jushi.english: It was a worth while attempt even though it failed to achieve its aim.
jushi.chinese: 这个尝试还是值得的,虽然并未达到目的。

jushi.english: She is trying to find a worthwhile job.
jushi.chinese: 她正试图去找一份好的工作。

jushi.english: The teacher recommended some really worthwhile novels to his students.
jushi.chinese: 老师推荐给学生一些真正有价值的小说。
